text: @simmonssteve OUCH! Bettman & his @NHL buddies better think "long & hard" before placing bunch of young players at risk of contracting #Covid19. In the long run, I smell a bunch of lawsuits that will OUTWEIGH any profits Gary believes hockey will make in revenues. Get well fast Auston Matthews
